sn22.153:1.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.3: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:1.5: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.6: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:1.10: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa, evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.11: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:1.15: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.153:1.17: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.18: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:1.25: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.153:1.27: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.28: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
